description: Need to register for a simple timer... I immediately uninstall it...
summary: I don't want to register for a timer..

description: Cannot sign in or do anything.
Cool app. Automatically synchronized with web app and mobile app.

Constantly reminds you to track your work-time even if it is 2am, even if you have disabled the notifications.

Not intuitive at all. It is very hard to set a project for the task you are working on.

It does not have a lot of stuff. It has some stuff you would rarely ever use but it implements almost nothing of the most useful features of Toggl.

The application does record time but it lacks the useful small timer that you can move around and so you have to start the application each time you want to specify the activity and check the time. I suggest adding the same timer as in Windows or to display the timer in the linux toolbar and allow users to choose the project from there as well.
summary: Needs a small timer in the notification bar

description: Muy útil para llevar el control de los tiempos en cada tarea, y utilizando el pomodoro también sirve para evitar procrastinar
Версия для видновс гораздо юзабельнее, чем версия для linux
